summary: Set in the year 1912 on Cape Cod, a lighthouse keeper who has disavowed any association with females, must deal with the appearance of two attractive women who move into a nearby cottage for the summer.
cast: Richard Dreyfuss|Bruce Dern|Mamie Gummer|Blythe Danner|Tom Wisdom|Julie Harris|Stephen Russell|Jason Alan Smith|Theodora Greece|Ben Dreyfuss|Ellen Becker-Gray|Robert Masiello
keywords: year 1912|cape cod massachusetts|lighthouse keeper|washed up on a beach|beach
title: The Lightkeepers
